description: Impose ensemble mean monthly mean of 3D stratospheric ozone from coupled-chemistry simulations of Scenario-MIP SSP2-4.5 simulations.
name: ssp2-45 stratospheric Ozone
rationale: Input for models with interactive chemistry that has been turned-off for the purposes of the DAMIP ssp245SOZchem simulations.
longName: DAMIP ssp2-45 ensemble mean monthly mean stratospheric ozone concentrations
keywords: DAMIP ssp2-45, ozone, concentration, O3, stratosphere
